description: Docker ignore file specifying which files and directories to exclude from Docker build context.
Development environment configuration file containing server ports, authentication secrets, API endpoints, and universal token settings.
Production environment configuration file with deployment-specific settings for ports, URLs, authentication credentials, and database connections.
Staging environment configuration file with test environment settings mirroring production structure for pre-deployment validation.
ESLint configuration file defining JavaScript code quality and style rules for the project.
Git ignore file specifying which files and directories should be excluded from version control.
Packaged distribution of the agent client application for deployment.
Agent client that listens to remote WebSocket server and triggers actions on local WebSocket connections (BroadSign player relay).
HTML interface for the agent client providing connection controls and status monitoring.
Stylesheet defining the visual appearance and layout for the agent client interface.

Standby/default image displayed when no active radio content is being broadcast.
Active image displayed when radio post message is received during broadcast periods.
HTML interface for the CFC Radio Activation Storm visual display client.
Stylesheet defining image transitions and layout for the radio activation display.
Photoshop source file for the radio activation display images.
Verbose version of radio activation client with enhanced logging and detailed status information for debugging.

Standby image for verbose radio activation client.
Active broadcast image for verbose radio activation client.
HTML interface for verbose radio activation client with detailed status panels and control information.
Documentation for the verbose radio activation client explaining features and configuration options.
Enhanced stylesheet with additional styling for verbose debug panels and status indicators.
Monitor/control panel client for testing WebSocket connections and sending custom messages to the radio room.
HTML interface for the monitor client providing message sending and connection testing capabilities.
Packaged distribution of the monitor client application.
Stylesheet for the monitor client control panel interface.
Player client that synchronizes radio content via WebSocket and sends custom POP (Proof of Play) messages to BroadSign with slot duration tracking.
Demo data or sample content file for player client testing and development.
Background image displayed in the player client interface.
HTML interface for the player client with content display and now-playing information.
Packaged distribution of the player client application.
Stylesheet defining layout and visual effects for the player client including fade transitions and logger display.
Test utility demonstrating BroadSign object integration and metadata extraction from player context.
Packaged BroadSign object test utility.
WebSocket connection testing utility for debugging server connectivity and authentication.
Multi-stage Docker container definition for building and deploying the Echo WebSocket server with production-optimized Node.js runtime.
System architecture documentation with diagrams explaining WebSocket rooms, authentication flow, and component interactions.
Detailed explanation of the HMAC-SHA256 token-based authentication flow including token generation and verification steps.
Comprehensive guide on implementing authentication for WebSocket connections including token management and security best practices.
Guide for automating token generation and deployment workflows using scripts and environment variables.
Documentation for integrating BroadSign digital signage metadata including frame IDs, player IDs, and slot duration tracking.
Step-by-step guide for deploying the Echo server to Google Cloud Run including environment configuration and health checks.
Pre-deployment checklist covering environment variables, security settings, and production readiness verification.
Documentation on securing the /docs Swagger API endpoint with SHA-256 hashed credentials.
Migration guide for the room endpoint restructuring from legacy routes to new room-based architecture.
Complete reference for all environment variables including server ports, authentication secrets, and feature flags.
Guide for switching between development, staging, and production environments using environment-specific .env files.
Technical migration documentation for transitioning from old room naming conventions to current structure.
Documentation on creating and managing long-lived authentication tokens for automated clients and services.
Guide for implementing persistent authentication tokens that survive server restarts.
Step-by-step guide for generating and testing authentication tokens using Postman API client.
Comprehensive production deployment guide covering Docker builds, environment configuration, and security hardening.
Quick reference card with common commands, endpoints, and configuration examples for developers.
Quick start guide for creating custom room handlers and implementing room-specific logic.
Documentation of health endpoint refactoring explaining the detailed and summary response modes.
Technical overview of the room-based architecture including BaseRoomHandler inheritance and auto-discovery mechanisms.
Developer guide for creating custom room handlers with examples of message processing and client management.
Documentation of routing system refactoring to support dynamic room-based endpoints.
Migration guide for updating client code to use new room-based routing structure.
Security documentation explaining SHA-256 credential hashing for documentation authentication.
Technical explanation of token storage, validation, and expiration mechanisms.
Visual Studio project file defining build configuration and project structure for the Echo server.

description: NPM lock file ensuring consistent dependency versions across installations.
NPM package manifest defining project metadata, dependencies, and build/run scripts for the WebSocket server.
SVG logo image used as favicon and branding for the server web interface.
Authentication middleware for the /docs Swagger endpoint using SHA-256 hashed credentials and session management.
Core authentication module implementing HMAC-SHA256 token generation, verification, and validation for WebSocket connections.
HTML login form for documentation endpoint authentication with client-side SHA-256 credential hashing.
Authentication system documentation explaining token generation, verification, and security implementation details.
Health check endpoint handler providing server status, room statistics, and client connection information with detailed/summary modes.
Documentation for the health endpoint including query parameters, response formats, and monitoring integration examples.
Legacy backward-compatibility endpoint bridging old /postcontent requests to new /rooms/radio/post endpoint with hardcoded token.
Documentation explaining the postcontent backward-compatibility bridge and migration path to new room endpoints.
Abstract base class defining the interface and default behavior for room-specific handlers with authentication and message processing hooks.
Chat room handler implementing basic message broadcasting with join/leave notifications extending BaseRoomHandler.
Room registry manager that auto-discovers room handlers, manages room collections, and provides handler access interface.
Radio room handler implementing content broadcasting with advertiser tracking, metadata processing, and configurable broadcast delays.
Express-style route definitions for room-specific HTTP endpoints including POST content injection.
Main WebSocket server implementation with HTTP server, room management, authentication enforcement, and health/documentation endpoints.
Swagger/OpenAPI specification generator defining API documentation for all endpoints, schemas, and WebSocket connections.
Utility script for generating SHA-256 hashes of email and password for documentation authentication setup.
Utility script for generating long-lived test tokens (100-year expiration) for development and testing.
PowerShell script for batch generating universal tokens for multiple client roles (monitor, screen, advertiser).
PowerShell script for generating a secure random AUTH_SECRET and updating environment configuration files.
Test client demonstrating dynamic BroadSign metadata integration with token generation and WebSocket connection.
Generic WebSocket test client for debugging connections, authentication, and message broadcasting.
Node.js test script for validating generic room HTTP POST endpoints with authentication.
Test utility for validating SHA-256 hashed authentication for documentation access.
Node.js test script verifying the postcontent backward-compatibility bridge functionality.
Node.js test script for validating radio room HTTP POST endpoint with authentication and payload processing.
Node.js test script for testing the radio postcontent injection endpoint with content validation.
